description.value: Scenario 3.x - Send MedicationData for J. de XXX_Luzac.
Specifies the query to run and general checks on the request.
Test client to POST a Bundle of type transaction.
Checks if all resources specified by the scenario can be identified unambiguously.

Confirm that the request Bundle contains 1 MedicationRequest resource(s) that reference(s) Medication with coding '49484|urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.10' (Acetylsalicylzuur tabletmsr 100mg) and contain(s) no ext-StopType and contain(s) no .reasonCode

Confirm that the request Bundle contains 1 MedicationRequest resource(s) that reference(s) Medication with coding '49484|urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.10' (Acetylsalicylzuur tabletmsr 100mg) and contain(s) ext-StopType with coding '410546004|http://snomed.info/sct' (stopgezet) and contain(s) .reasonCode with coding '79899007|http://snomed.info/sct' (geneesmiddelinteractie)

expression.value: Bundle.entry.select(resource as MedicationRequest).where(medication.resolve().code.coding.where(system = 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.10' and code = '49484')).where(modifierExtension.where(url = 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-StopType').value.coding.where(system = 'http://snomed.info/sct' and code = '410546004')).where(reasonCode.coding.where(system = 'http://snomed.info/sct' and code = '79899007')).count() = 1
